MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the PA5 postcode area of Johnstone, affecting properties in Craigview Terrace and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 11:12PM. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of ongoing investigation works and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2:14 AM on Tuesday, 12 January 2021.
